content: in chain-2 space half_double_crochet in next 12 st fphdc in popcorn half_double_crochet in next 7 st fphdc in popcorn half_double_crochet in next 12 st x 4 finish off color b 2 fphdc 33 half_double_crochet 1 chain-2 space per side round 15 with color c 2 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet as corner in chain-2 space bpdc in next 35 st x 4 finish off color c 35 bpdc 4 double_crochet 1 chain-2 space per side copyright 2019 laurie dale please do not redistribute with or without charge in any form this includes scanning emailing photocopying retyping posting to the internet and any other form of redistribution permission is granted to sell items made using this design do not claim this design as your own you may post photos of items made from this pattern to your website blog social media or ravelry com but please include a link to the original pattern page on ravelry com 4
